document_data.caption: A map of Callidyrr showing Ogden in the Dernall Forest.
document_data.name: Ogden
document_data.mainbody: '''Ogden''' was a small town located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Ogden was located along the [[High King's Road]] near the center of the [[Dernall Forest]]'s eastern edge. Ogden was just {{SI|20|mi|k|long=yes}} due south of [[Caer Callidyrr]] in the county of [[Talffolk]].
